name: CogniForge: The Absolute Universal Environment v9.0
postCreateCommand: echo '>>> [DevContainer] Building base Docker images...' && docker compose build
postStartCommand: echo '>>> [DevContainer] Starting all services & installing host dependencies...' && pip install -r requirements.txt && docker compose up -d

postAttachCommand.db-setup: echo '>>> [DevContainer] Migrating database...'; if command -v docker >/dev/null 2>&1; then docker compose run --rm migrations; else flask db upgrade; fi
